metadata.description: Deploys a vHub in another location for multi region connectivity if set to True.
Name of the Resource Group that the MainHub will be deployed to.
Azure Datacenter location that the main resouces will be deployed to.
Name of the Resource Group that the MainHub will be deployed to.
Azure Datacenter location that the branch resouces will be deployed to.  This can be left blank if you are not deploying the hub in multiple regions

Name of the Virtual WAN resource
